relics.name: Fetid Fern
relics.description: Whenever you apply bogwarden:Maledict, apply 1 Poison.
relics.flavorText: The final ingredient of bog stew.

relics.name: Marsh Chimes
relics.description: Whenever you Scry during your turn, deal 3 damage to random enemy for each card discarded.
relics.flavorText: The pitch of this can only be heard by certain species.

relics.name: Glowpad
relics.flavorText: The light from this can penetrate even the thickest of fog.

relics.name: Picked Cuffs
relics.description: bogwarden:Traps now trigger when discarded or Scryed.
relics.flavorText: There's a shiv fragment lodged inside.

relics.name: Skeletal Shield
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, gain 5 bogwarden:Spines.

relics.name: Boghopper
relics.description: At the end of your turn, trigger the leftmost bogwarden:Trap in your hand and Exhaust it.
relics.flavorText: "Those darned boghoppers!! Stay away from my traps!" - Phrog Skinnin' Phineas

potions.name: Pinprick Potion
potions.description: Lose 1 HP twice. Next turn, heal for 10% of your Max HP.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

mods.name: The Bogwarden's Swamp Stash
mods.description: Adds 6 new relics for the Bogwarden as well as 2 new potions and 7 achievements to earn!
